home.title: Body Measurements
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Body Measurement

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Body Measurement {{ id }}?

help.height: Patient's height. Alongside with weight it is used to calculate BMI factor
help.weight: Patient's weight. Alongside with height it is used to calculate BMI factor
help.percentOfFatTissue: Percent of fat tissue in patient's body. Norm for women: 16-20. Norm for men: 15-18
help.percentOfWater: Percent of water in patient's body. Norm for women: 45-60. Norm for men: 50-65
help.muscleMass: Mass of patient's muscle tissue in kilograms
help.calciumInBones: Level of calcium in patient's bones in kilograms. Norm: ~2.4kg

appointmentsBodyMeasurement.created: A new Body Measurement is created with identifier {{ param }}
appointmentsBodyMeasurement.updated: A Body Measurement is updated with identifier {{ param }}
appointmentsBodyMeasurement.deleted: A Body Measurement is deleted with identifier {{ param }}
